eeta amatharawa yanthropakarana nishpadanaya karana ha eewa apanayanaya thaththwayata langakara gath aayojakayo 26k mita idiripath wi thibe.pitaratawala yanthropakarana nishpadanaya karana prakata samagam 90ka pradarshana kuti 200k me pradarshana bime sthapitha kota atha.wanija kendrayak bawata pathkaramin dawantha sanwardhanayak kara piyanangana shri lankawe aarthika sanwardhanayata dawantha shakthiyak labadena "riflekshan of shri lanka" welanda, sancharaka ha aayojana pradarshanaya sandaha siyalu katayuthu sudanam bawa rajaya awadharanaya karayi.baththaramulledi aarambha wana meya podurajya mandaliya rajya nayaka samuluwata samangamiwa pawathwena athara eyashri lanka ithihasaye wishalathama pradarshanaya bawada lokaye pramukha pele wyaparikayanta, sancharakayanta menma shri lankawe apanayanakaruwanta eya wiwrutha bawada karmantha ha wanija katayuthu amathyanshaye lekam anura siriwardhana mahatha "dinamina" ta pawasiya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen labana 13 da paswaruwe wiwrutha kerena me welanda, sancharaka ha aayojana pradarshanaya sandaha pradarshana kuti 850 k pamana idiripathkara thibena bawa pawasu ee mahatha pradhana apanayanakaruwan 310 k sulu ha madhya parimana apanayanakaruwan 210 k ee wenuwen sahabhagi wana bawada sadahan kaleya.
